Package gil.io

Interface Summary
IControlCommandInvokeable Interface for classes that have the possibility of invoking control commands.
IExternalSystemAdapter The common interface to be implemented for every new type of external system to be integrated to the simulator process models.
IPipelineStage The interface to be implemented for stages to be added to the transfer pipeline.
IProcessModelAdapter The common interface to be implemented for every new type of process model to be connected to GIL.
ISimulatorNativeBoundary Interface that may be used as a template when there is a need to implement part of the process model adapter in a different language than Java.
 

Class Summary
ESAdapterCapabilities A class with fields used to specifying the capabilities of a adapter implementing the IExternalSystemAdapter interface.
PipelineStage Abstract baseclass for pipeline stages.
